text: welcome to simply perfect where we share
some of our favorite but on tequila
cocktails the old-fashioned true to its
name is literally the oldest cocktail on
the book we begin by seasoning the
inside of a double old fashioned glass
with the zest of an orange to sweeten
the drink we use just a quarter ounce of
simple syrup and a dash of aromatic
bitters and of course the cocktail would
not be complete without two ounces of
patron on yaho tequila bartender G is
ice the way the chefs use heat so it's
important to use the biggest hardest
cold ice cubes that you can get your
hands on stir the old fashioned in the
glass I stir the drink until a light
frost appears on the outside of the
glass and for the final touch we're
gonna give it one last orange zest to
give the drink a nice aromatic finish
express the essential oil over the
surface of the glass and there you have
the patron on yaho old-fashioned Cheers
you
